attributes.additional_details: Politicians are blatantly ignoring the mandate that was given to them by their constituents many are calling for a 2nd referendum/peoples vote we have already had this vote and they will not implement the result due to their own personal beliefs, we now need to have an election so that we can elect new representatives who are willing to represent the seat that they have been elected to and not just steal our voice to represent their own political views.
attributes.background: Politicians from all political parties have proved without a doubt that they are unwilling to carry out the result of the referendum to leave the EU this is based on their own personal preferences and not the democratic will of the electorate.
